Posts.EditableText: MirageMUD is the first MUD game/source to be created using the Mirage Source gaming engine. It features the ability to create an advanced, and professional looking graphical user interface, which is a huge step up from the tradition Telnet MUDs. MirageMUD features room-based movement, monsters, shops, leveling guilds, banks, spells, armies, midi/wav/MP3 support, advanced character creation, races, classes, personal profiles, parties and more. MirageMUD is a stepping stone for any MUD enthusiast with Visual Basic knowledge, to creating their very own advanced online RPG game. The source comes equipped with editing tools in the server to make creating and editing your world simple and easy. Posts.HTML:
MirageMUD is the first MUD game/source to be created using the Mirage Source gaming engine. It features the ability to create an advanced, and professional looking graphical user interface, which is a huge step up from the tradition Telnet MUDs. MirageMUD features room-based movement, monsters, shops, leveling guilds, banks, spells, armies, midi/wav/MP3 support, advanced character creation, races, classes, personal profiles, parties and more. MirageMUD is a stepping stone for any MUD enthusiast with Visual Basic knowledge, to creating their very own advanced online RPG game. The source comes equipped with editing tools in the server to make creating and editing your world simple and easy.

Screenshot: http://www.planet-source-code.com/Uploa ... 138175.jpg

Website: http://www.miragesource.draignet.com
